name: Lucky! Coin Pusher
description:
Play and get fun in Coin Pusher Every day!

Coin Pusher is an easy coin dozer game, which is perfect for fun!

How to Play?

1. Click and drop nickels on the table.
2. Collect your coins by pushing coins off the table.
3. Push coins into the box to make machine run.
4. Using "Shake" to make pushing coins faster.
5. Using "Wall" to keep coins on the table.

Tap and push coins to win!

Contact us at: nicergamestudio@163.com
